➢ Why adopt Part 35 by reference???
➢ Why adopt Part 35 by reference??? ➢ W h y
a d o p t
P a r t
3 5
b y
r e f e r e n c e ? ? ?

Easier to adopt regulations by reference under Administrative Procedures Act standards of:
Easier to adopt regulations by reference under Administrative Procedures Act
standards of:

▪ Authority ▪ Reference ▪ Consistency ▪ Clarity ▪ Non-duplication ▪ Necessity
▪ Authority ▪ A u t h o r i t y
▪ Reference ▪ R e f e r e n c e
▪ Consistency ▪ C o n s i s t e n c y
▪ Clarity ▪ C l a r i t y
▪ Non-duplication ▪ N o n - d u p l i c a t i o n
▪ Necessity ▪ N e c e s s i t y

Less cumbersome than to create our own regulation from scratch
Less cumbersome than to create our own regulation from scratch

program.
